main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a square yellow object with tentacles rising straight up in Great Neck, Long Island on December 12, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a baseball, emitting smoke and a humming sound., The observation lasted for 5 minutes., The object was stationary before moving straight up., The observer was a 34-year-old reporter from Newsday., The sighting occurred during broken cumulus weather with scattered snow.
sighted object: one square yellow object with tentacles
